LanguageData.Hediffs_DexterousLv1.label: Kiyō-sa Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_DexterousLv1.description: Tip 1: To earn the Level 3 permanent buff from Kiyō (Dexterous)/Kiyō-sa (Dexterity) eat an elaborate meal twice a day for 30 days.
LanguageData.Hediffs_DexterousLv2.label: Kiyō-sa Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_DexterousLv2.description: Tip 2: The Level 3 buff is quite beefy. Keep on eating!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Dexterous.label: Kiyō-sa
LanguageData.Hediffs_Dexterous.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Dexterous.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.Hediffs_Dexterous.stages.1.label: Lv.3
LanguageData.Hediffs_Dexterous.stages.2.label: Lv.4 Max
